academy: a graduate of the <1>Fullstack Developer</1> program at <3>Coding Academy</3>, and also hold a Bachelor’s degree in <5>Economics and Information Systems</5> from <7>Tel-Hai College</7>.
why web: I was first exposed to the field of <1>web development</1> toward the end of my undergraduate studies. The feeling that a single line of code could display something tangible on the screen made me connect deeply to <1>web development</1>, the field I chose to specialize in.
professional knowledge: With my professional knowledge, I want to build websites with a solid foundation and proper architecture, designed to reflect each person’s unique taste.
difference: The key difference between a website I develop from scratch with <1>clean code</1> and the <3>Off the Shelf</3> website builders is that code-based websites provide <5>faster browsing performance</5>, optimized site structure for <7>search engine ranking</7>, and complete <9>design freedom</9> without being limited by templates.
every business needs: In today’s world, every business needs an <1>online presence</1>, not only on social media. I’m here to walk with you step by step, with professionalism and a smile!

websites.title: Websites
websites.description: From a simple landing page to a full-featured e-commerce store, tailored to your needs.

design.title: Design
design.description: Custom websites designed with user experience and unique branding in mind.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Built according to accessibility standards so everyone can use your website comfortably.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Expand your audience with websites available in multiple languages.

copywriting.title: Copywriting
copywriting.description: Clear, engaging texts that highlight your business values and communicate your message effectively.

skills.title: The languages and technologies that power your website
skills.line1: Websites built from scratch with code using the <1>best technology</1>.
skills.line2: They are <1>clean</1>, <3>fast</3>, and <5>fully customized</5> for your business and your audience.
skills.line3: Now is the time to <1>step out of the template</1> and build a website that feels <3>natural</3>, <5>unique</5>, and truly yours.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.body: The Gal-Code website ("the Website") respects your privacy and complies with Israeli law and international privacy regulations.

whatWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
whatWeCollect.contactForm: Contact form: name, phone, email, and message — sent directly to our email (luskigal@gmail.com) and not stored in any database.
whatWeCollect.cookies: Cookies: used only to remember your language preference (Hebrew/English/Spanish).

howWeUse.title: How We Use Information
howWeUse.languagePref: To remember your language preference and improve user experience.

sharing.title: Sharing with Third Parties
sharing.body: We do not share personal data with third parties unless legally required.

security.title: Data Security
security.body: We apply reasonable security measures but cannot guarantee absolute protection.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.erase: Request deletion of data, subject to law.
yourRights.cookies: Manage or delete cookies through your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: For any questions or requests regarding this policy, please contact us by email.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.body: Gal-Code is committed to making this website accessible to all users, in line with Israeli law and WCAG 2.1 AA.

scope.title: Accessibility on This Site
scope.languages: Support for three languages: Hebrew, English, Spanish.
scope.dir: RTL support for Hebrew and LTR for English/Spanish.
scope.responsive: Responsive for desktop and mobile browsing.
scope.alts: Alternative text for all meaningful images.
scope.forms: Forms accessible with screen readers, with labels and clear error messages.

standards.title: Standards
standards.body: This site was developed in line with WCAG 2.1 AA. Some content may still be undergoing improvements.

feedback.title: Accessibility Feedback
feedback.body: If you encounter an accessibility issue, please contact us and we will address it promptly.

enforcement.title: Enforcement
enforcement.body: In Israel, enforcement is carried out under the Equal Rights for Persons with Disabilities Law.
